text: Buruji Kashamu (19 May 1958 â€“ 8 August 2020) was a Nigerian politician. He was a member of the People's Democratic Party. From 2015 to 2019, he was a member of the Nigerian Senate. He was born in Ogun State, Nigeria. Kashamu died in Lagos on 8 August 2020 from COVID-19, aged 62. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Lagos Category:Nigerian politicians Category:People from Ogun State
title: Buruji Kashamu
